mapper.select: SELECT THIRD_CATEGORY_NO,THIRD_CATEGORY_NAME,MAIN_CATEGORY_NO FROM CATEGORY JOIN SUB_CATEGORY USING(SUB_CATEGORY_NO) ORDER BY 1

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT_REQUEST JOIN REQUEST_FILE USING(PROJECT_REQUEST_NO) LEFT JOIN CATEGORY USING(THIRD_CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN SUB_CATEGORY USING(SUB_CATEGORY_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND REQUEST_FILE_ORDER = 0 ORDER BY PROJECT_REQUEST_CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT PROJECT_REQUEST_NO, PROJECT_REQUEST_TITLE, PROJECT_REQUEST_SUMMARY, PROJECT_REQUEST_CONTENT, PROJECT_REQUEST_BUDGET, TO_CHAR(REQUEST_RECRUIT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REQUEST_RECRUIT_DATE, TO_CHAR(PROJECT_REQUEST_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')PROJECT_REQUEST_CREATE_DATE, REQUEST_WORK_DATE, PROJECT_WORK_PERIOD, SUB_CATEGORY_NO,SUB_CATEGORY_NAME, THIRD_CATEGORY_NO,THIRD_CATEGORY_NAME, MAIN_CATEGORY_NO,MAIN_CATEGORY_NAME, CASE WHEN PROJECT_REQUEST_STATUS = 1 THEN '승인 대기 중' WHEN PROJECT_REQUEST_STATUS = 2 THEN '모집 중' WHEN PROJECT_REQUEST_STATUS = 3 THEN '미승인' WHEN PROJECT_REQUEST_STATUS = 4 THEN '모집 마감' END AS PROJECT_REQUEST_STATUS, REQUEST_FILE_NO, REQUEST_FILE_PATH FROM PROJECT_REQUEST JOIN REQUEST_FILE USING(PROJECT_REQUEST_NO) LEFT JOIN CATEGORY USING(THIRD_CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN SUB_CATEGORY USING(SUB_CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN MAIN_CATEGORY USING(MAIN_CATEGORY_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND REQUEST_FILE_ORDER = 0 ORDER BY PROJECT_REQUEST_NO DESC
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_PROJECT_REQUEST_NO.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO "PROJECT_REQUEST" VALUES(#{projectRequestNo}, #{myProject.projectRequestTitle}, #{myProject.projectRequestSummary}, #{myProject.projectRequestContent}, #{myProject.projectRequestBudget}, #{myProject.projectRecruitDate},#{myProject.projectWorkDate},#{myProject.projectWorkPeriod}, DEFAULT, #{myProject.thirdCategoryNo}, #{loginMember}, DEFAULT ,DEFAULT)

INSERT INTO REQUEST_FILE SELECT SEQ_REQUEST_FILE_NO.NEXTVAL REQUEST_FILE_NO, A.* FROM
SELECT #{img.requestFilePath} REQUEST_FILE_PATH, #{img.requestFileOrder} REQUEST_FILE_ORDER, #{img.projectRequestNo} PROJECT_REQUEST_NO FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT_PROPOSAL JOIN PROJECT_REQUEST USING (PROJECT_REQUEST_NO) JOIN FREELANCER USING (FREELANCER_NO) JOIN "MEMBER" ON ("MEMBER".MEMBER_NO=FREELANCER_NO) JOIN GRADE USING(GRADE_NO) LEFT JOIN CATEGORY USING(THIRD_CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN SUB_CATEGORY USING(SUB_CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN MAIN_CATEGORY USING(MAIN_CATEGORY_NO) WHERE PROJECT_REQUEST.MEMBER_NO =#{memberNo}

SELECT PROJECT_REQUEST_NO, PROJECT_PROPOSAL_NO, PROJECT_REQUEST_TITLE, FREELANCER_NO, PROPOSAL_PRICE, MEMBER_NAME AS FREELANCER_NAME, GRADE_NO, GRADE_NAME,PROJECT_WORK_PERIOD,PROPOSAL_EDIT_NUM, PROJECT_REQUEST_SUMMARY, PROJECT_REQUEST_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(PROJECT_REQUEST_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')PROJECT_REQUEST_CREATE_DATE, CASE WHEN PROPOSAL_ADOPT_STATUS = 1 THEN '대기 중' WHEN PROPOSAL_ADOPT_STATUS = 2 THEN '채택' WHEN PROPOSAL_ADOPT_STATUS = 3 THEN '모집마감' END AS PROPOSAL_ADOPT_STATUS, MAIN_CATEGORY_NO,MAIN_CATEGORY_NAME,SUB_CATEGORY_NO,SUB_CATEGORY_NAME,THIRD_CATEGORY_NO, THIRD_CATEGORY_NAME FROM PROJECT_PROPOSAL JOIN PROJECT_REQUEST USING (PROJECT_REQUEST_NO) JOIN FREELANCER USING (FREELANCER_NO) JOIN "MEMBER" ON ("MEMBER".MEMBER_NO=FREELANCER_NO) JOIN GRADE USING(GRADE_NO) LEFT JOIN CATEGORY USING(THIRD_CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN SUB_CATEGORY USING(SUB_CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN MAIN_CATEGORY USING(MAIN_CATEGORY_NO) WHERE PROJECT_REQUEST.MEMBER_NO =#{memberNo} ORDER BY PROJECT_PROPOSAL_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT_REQUEST JOIN REQUEST_FILE USING(PROJECT_REQUEST_NO) LEFT JOIN CATEGORY USING(THIRD_CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN SUB_CATEGORY USING(SUB_CATEGORY_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND REQUEST_FILE_ORDER = 0
ORDER BY PROJECT_REQUEST_NO DESC
AND MAIN_CATEGORY_NO = 1 ORDER BY PROJECT_REQUEST_NO DESC
AND MAIN_CATEGORY_NO = 2 ORDER BY PROJECT_REQUEST_NO DESC
AND MAIN_CATEGORY_NO = 3 ORDER BY PROJECT_REQUEST_NO DESC
AND MAIN_CATEGORY_NO = 4 ORDER BY PROJECT_REQUEST_NO DESC
AND MAIN_CATEGORY_NO = 5 ORDER BY PROJECT_REQUEST_NO DESC

SELECT PROJECT_REQUEST_NO, PROJECT_REQUEST_TITLE, PROJECT_REQUEST_SUMMARY, PROJECT_REQUEST_CONTENT, PROJECT_REQUEST_BUDGET, TO_CHAR(REQUEST_RECRUIT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REQUEST_RECRUIT_DATE, TO_CHAR(PROJECT_REQUEST_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')PROJECT_REQUEST_CREATE_DATE, REQUEST_WORK_DATE, PROJECT_WORK_PERIOD, SUB_CATEGORY_NO,SUB_CATEGORY_NAME, THIRD_CATEGORY_NO,THIRD_CATEGORY_NAME, MAIN_CATEGORY_NO,MAIN_CATEGORY_NAME, CASE WHEN PROJECT_REQUEST_STATUS = 1 THEN '승인 대기 중' WHEN PROJECT_REQUEST_STATUS = 2 THEN '모집 중' WHEN PROJECT_REQUEST_STATUS = 3 THEN '미승인' WHEN PROJECT_REQUEST_STATUS = 4 THEN '모집 마감' END AS PROJECT_REQUEST_STATUS, REQUEST_FILE_NO, REQUEST_FILE_PATH FROM PROJECT_REQUEST JOIN REQUEST_FILE USING(PROJECT_REQUEST_NO) LEFT JOIN CATEGORY USING(THIRD_CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN SUB_CATEGORY USING(SUB_CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN MAIN_CATEGORY USING(MAIN_CATEGORY_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND REQUEST_FILE_ORDER = 0
ORDER BY PROJECT_REQUEST_NO DESC
AND MAIN_CATEGORY_NO = 1 ORDER BY PROJECT_REQUEST_NO DESC
AND MAIN_CATEGORY_NO = 2 ORDER BY PROJECT_REQUEST_NO DESC
AND MAIN_CATEGORY_NO = 3 ORDER BY PROJECT_REQUEST_NO DESC
AND MAIN_CATEGORY_NO = 4 ORDER BY PROJECT_REQUEST_NO DESC
AND MAIN_CATEGORY_NO = 5 ORDER BY PROJECT_REQUEST_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT_PROPOSAL JOIN PROJECT_REQUEST USING (PROJECT_REQUEST_NO) JOIN FREELANCER USING (FREELANCER_NO) JOIN "MEMBER" ON ("MEMBER".MEMBER_NO=FREELANCER_NO) JOIN GRADE USING(GRADE_NO) LEFT JOIN CATEGORY USING(THIRD_CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN SUB_CATEGORY USING(SUB_CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN MAIN_CATEGORY USING(MAIN_CATEGORY_NO) WHERE PROJECT_REQUEST.MEMBER_NO =#{memberNo}
ORDER BY PROJECT_REQUEST_NO DESC
AND MAIN_CATEGORY_NO = 1 ORDER BY PROJECT_REQUEST_NO DESC
AND MAIN_CATEGORY_NO = 2 ORDER BY PROJECT_REQUEST_NO DESC
AND MAIN_CATEGORY_NO = 3 ORDER BY PROJECT_REQUEST_NO DESC
AND MAIN_CATEGORY_NO = 4 ORDER BY PROJECT_REQUEST_NO DESC
AND MAIN_CATEGORY_NO = 5 ORDER BY PROJECT_REQUEST_NO DESC

SELECT PROJECT_REQUEST_NO, PROJECT_PROPOSAL_NO, PROJECT_REQUEST_TITLE, FREELANCER_NO, PROPOSAL_PRICE, MEMBER_NAME AS FREELANCER_NAME, GRADE_NO, GRADE_NAME,PROJECT_WORK_PERIOD,PROPOSAL_EDIT_NUM, PROJECT_REQUEST_SUMMARY, PROJECT_REQUEST_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(PROJECT_REQUEST_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')PROJECT_REQUEST_CREATE_DATE, CASE WHEN PROPOSAL_ADOPT_STATUS = 1 THEN '대기 중' WHEN PROPOSAL_ADOPT_STATUS = 2 THEN '채택' WHEN PROPOSAL_ADOPT_STATUS = 3 THEN '모집마감' END AS PROPOSAL_ADOPT_STATUS, MAIN_CATEGORY_NO,MAIN_CATEGORY_NAME,SUB_CATEGORY_NO,SUB_CATEGORY_NAME,THIRD_CATEGORY_NO, THIRD_CATEGORY_NAME FROM PROJECT_PROPOSAL JOIN PROJECT_REQUEST USING (PROJECT_REQUEST_NO) JOIN FREELANCER USING (FREELANCER_NO) JOIN "MEMBER" ON ("MEMBER".MEMBER_NO=FREELANCER_NO) JOIN GRADE USING(GRADE_NO) LEFT JOIN CATEGORY USING(THIRD_CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN SUB_CATEGORY USING(SUB_CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN MAIN_CATEGORY USING(MAIN_CATEGORY_NO) WHERE PROJECT_REQUEST.MEMBER_NO =#{memberNo}
ORDER BY PROJECT_PROPOSAL_NO DESC
AND MAIN_CATEGORY_NO = 1 ORDER BY PROJECT_PROPOSAL_NO DESC
AND MAIN_CATEGORY_NO = 2 ORDER BY PROJECT_PROPOSAL_NO DESC
AND MAIN_CATEGORY_NO = 3 ORDER BY PROJECT_PROPOSAL_NO DESC
AND MAIN_CATEGORY_NO = 4 ORDER BY PROJECT_PROPOSAL_NO DESC
AND MAIN_CATEGORY_NO = 5 ORDER BY PROJECT_PROPOSAL_NO DESC
SELECT REQUEST_FILE_PATH FROM REQUEST_FILE WHERE REQUEST_FILE_ORDER = 0 AND PROJECT_REQUEST_NO = #{projectRequestNo}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_SERVICE_NO.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO SERVICE VALUES(#{serviceNo}, #{projectRequestTitle}, #{projectRequestSummary}, #{projectRequestContent}, #{proposalPrice}, #{proposalEditNum}, #{projectWorkPeriod}, 5, #{projectCreateDate}, #{thirdCategoryNo}, #{freelancerNo}, DEFAULT)

SELECT SEQ_TRADE_NO.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TRADE VALUES(#{tradeNo}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{serviceNo}, #{memberNo},#{tradeRequest})
mapper.update: UPDATE PROJECT_PROPOSAL SET PROPOSAL_ADOPT_STATUS = 3 WHERE PROJECT_PROPOSAL_NO IN(SELECT PROJECT_PROPOSAL_NO FROM PROJECT_PROPOSAL JOIN PROJECT_REQUEST USING(PROJECT_REQUEST_NO) WHERE PROPOSAL_ADOPT_STATUS = 1 AND PROJECT_REQUEST_NO = #{projectRequestNo})
